About

Heya! I'm Aakash ($root) currently studying Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science at National Institute of Technology Warangal. I've been doing web development seriously for over 2 years and before that I still couldn't put my computer away. I was always doing web development and penetration tests in my free time, and even in class! It was something I was and still am very passionate about today, I also do penetration testing and do bug bounty and provide cyber-security.

One day I hope to be able to travel and meet new people around the world.

What I Do

I (mostly) specialize in web design, development and penetration testing! Here‚Äôs a taste of what I do:

  • Web Development! This is the core of what I do, and because of that I make an effort to keep up with the latest in an ever-changing field. From the frontend to backend and everything in between, I can make magic happen.
  • UI/UX Design! I build products with humans in mind - with simple, straightforward, and joyful user interfaces. The general rule of thumb is that if you need to explain how to use your product, then it‚Äôs too complex.
  • Cyber-Security & Penetration testing I enjoy finding bugs and obviously reporting them in bug bounty programs in my free time. Read more here

What I am Learning

I consider myself to be a lifetime learner. Here are skills I am working on improving in the near future:

  • Guitar! I am learning how to play guitar because playing the guitar is the most popular of the instruments people want to learn and be in peace, to relax. The guitar is used for so many songs and is a blast to play at friend and family gatherings.
  • Psychology! I want to understand why people do things the way they do, not just in the physical world but also digital world. That‚Äôs why I am studying human computer-interaction in my free time, to better understand the diverse mindset of users.
